ex 1 :
exemple decimal : 10,52,67,96 
exemple addition : 10 + 52 = 62
exemple octal : 72,67
exemple addition : 72 + 67 = 161
exemple binaire : 0110 et 1000
exemple addition : 0110 + 1000 = 1110
exemple exadecimal : FE, A8, 98, 179
exemple addition : FE + A8 = 1A6

ex 2 :
110(2) = 6(10)
11101(2) = 29(10)
110010100(2) = 404(10)

53(8) = 5*8^1 + 3*8^0 = 43(10)
267(8) = 183(10)
142(8) = 98(10)

E(16) = 14(10)
5B(16) = 91(10)
CAFE(16) = 51 966(10)

ex 3 :
26(10) = 0001 1010(2)
964(10) = 0001 1110 0100(2)
157(10) = 0101 1101(2)

2396(10) = 4534
372(10) = 564(8)
118(10) = 166(8)

4129(10) = 1021(16)
612(10) = 264(16)
375(10) = 177(16)

ex 4 :
C5(16) = 125(10) = 1100 0101(2)
D9A3(16) = 14 003(10) = 1101 1001 1010 0011(2)
4C8(16) = 1224(10) = 0100 1100 1000(2)

0001 1001 0101(2) = 405(10) = 195(16)
0100 1011 0100(2) = 4B4(16)

75(8) = 111101(2)
643(8) = 110100011(2)
215(8) = 010001101(2)

001 100 101(2) = 145(8)
001 000 110(2) = 106(8)


3.2 = 0011.0011
1.0625 = 0001.0001

01000110110001100000100100000000 :
s = 0 donc positif
E = 1000 1101 = 141
donc e = 141 - 127 = 14
m = 10001100000100100000000
donc : 1.1000110000010010 * 2**14 = (1 - 2**-1 + 2**-5 + 2**-6 + 2**-12 + 2**-15) * 2**14 = 25349.000000307
